QuestData.Title: Protect the Frontier
QuestData.Description: Hail, $n. Wild animals are growing more and more aggressive the farther we get from Goldshire, and the Eastvale Logging Camp suffers nearly constant attacks from wolves and bears!$B$BWe could use your help out here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Prowlers or Gray Forest Wolves and 5 Young Forest Bears, and then return to Guard Thomas at the east Elwynn bridge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you killed those wolves and bears?
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks a lot for the help, $n. Something in the forest must be making these animals so bold.$B$BWhatever it is, I hope it stays there.
